TypeSignature.Value: public delegate string ExpressionFunctions.VerifyExpression(object value, Expression expression, int child);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed ExpressionFunctions/VerifyExpression extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ExpressionFunctions.VerifyExpression(value As Object, expression As Expression, child As Integer) As String
type ExpressionFunctions.VerifyExpression = delegate of obj * Expression * int -> string

Docs.summary: Verify the result of an expression is of the appropriate type and return a string if not.
Docs.returns: Null if value if correct or error string otherwise.
